member.summary: Exports workbooks to PDF format by rendering worksheets as paginated documents; import is not supported.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Identifies this format provider as "PdfFormatProvider" for registration and lookup.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfFormatProvider.FilesDescription
member.summary: Describes the file type as "PDF Documents" for display in UI contexts.

member.summary: Indicates that this provider supports exporting workbooks to PDF format.
member.value: The value indicating whether can export.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfFormatProvider.CanImport
member.summary: Indicates that this provider does not support importing PDF files into workbooks.
member.value: The value indicating whether can import.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfFormatProvider.ExportOverride(Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.Model.Workbook,System.IO.Stream,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
